select.title: Select a Wallet
select.text: Please select a wallet to connect to this dapp:

stake_modal.title: Stake TPA
stake_modal.subtitle1: Receive dividends from the TPA loan ecosystem by staking at least 100,000 tokens. Tokens may be unstaked at any time.
stake_modal.subtitle2: Staking is done in two steps. First, approve tokens for transfer to the staking contract. Then, stake the tokens.

unstake_modal.title: Unstake TPA
unstake_modal.subtitle: Unstake your TPA. WARNING - this cannot be undone, and your unstaked TPA will be locked for {days} days. Visit this page again after {days} days to retrieve your locked TPA.

unlock_modal.title: Unlock TPA
unlock_modal.subtitle: Unlock your TPA. TPA can be unlocked {days} days after unstaking.

faucet.no_wallet: Connect a wallet to access the faucet

proposals.title: Proposals
proposals.create_text: This page is for demonstration purposes. Proposal creation is not available yet.
proposals.author: Author

comments.connect: Connect your wallet to post a comment

errors.no_metamask: Metamask was not detected. Make sure you're logged in.
errors.metamask_denied: Please select a Metamask wallet, or choose a different connection method.
errors.tx_reverted: The transaction reverted for an unknown reason. Make sure you have sufficient balance.
errors.nonce_high: Nonce too high. Try resetting your Metamask account.
